WorkItem.Description:
I'm using @import in my .less file. The chirp.config file includes the parent.less file and updates correctly when I save it, but does not update when I save the child.less file. 

It would be nice if Chirpy could recursively find the imports and update when those are saved. Alternatively, I would be happy if I could just add the files to watch in the chirp.config file without those being included in the output (eg, add a <Watch Path="" /> element).
WorkItem.Summary: Update mashed file when .less imported file is updated
